# jvm-encryption-sample

Encryption samples.

## AES
Open/modify `AesApp.kt` and run the `main` function.

You'll get the following (similar) output:

```
AES KEY GENERATION
Key (Base64): fLivmIofMNx1S0vx4yorqerF26rw8T7tF54HC/UldjY=
IV (Base64): 8NV+Jf/TU2JB+qIgSw2aHw==

AES ENCRYPTION
Key (Base64): fLivmIofMNx1S0vx4yorqerF26rw8T7tF54HC/UldjY=
IV (Base64) - Optional: 8NV+Jf/TU2JB+qIgSw2aHw==
Message: Hello world!
Encrypted message (Base64): upqRbjPahMIfMDSI/my7cA==
IV (Base64): 8NV+Jf/TU2JB+qIgSw2aHw==

AES DECRYPTION
Key (Base64): fLivmIofMNx1S0vx4yorqerF26rw8T7tF54HC/UldjY=
IV (Base64): 8NV+Jf/TU2JB+qIgSw2aHw==
Encrypted message (Base64): upqRbjPahMIfMDSI/my7cA==
Decrypted message: Hello world!
```

## RSA
Open/modify `RsaApp.kt` and run the `main` function.

You'll get the following (similar) output:
```
RSA KEY GENERATION
PubKey (Base64): 
PrvKey (Base64): 

RSA ENCRYPTION
PubKey (Base64): 
Message: Hello world!
Encrypted message (Base64): 

RSA DECRYPTION
PrvKey (Base64): 
Encrypted message (Base64): 
Decrypted message: Hello world!

RSA SIGNATURE
PrvKey (Base64): 
Message: Hello world!
Signature (Base64): 

RSA SIGNATURE VERIFICATION
PubKey (Base64): 
Message: Hello world!
Signature (Base64): 
Valid Signature: true
```
